name: Discover O - Match Colors
description:
Discover O is a color matching fast reflex game that challenges players color coordination.

In the latest update of Discover O inspired by Game of Thrones you can uncover dragons, massive Titans, wolves and war ships while you deftly swipe your way through Discover O listening to an epic soundtrack.
Unlock the home of dragons, land of kings, the wall, icy castle and the land of Titan.

Set in vibrant minimalist worlds inspired by our favourite destinations around the globe, Discover O is equal parts addictive and inspiring.

Discover O asks the player to swipe the centre O up, down, left or right to match it to the right color. The difficulty increases as the colour of the rotating walls around the O start to converge and mimic each other.

As the player continues, the O shrinks at an increasing speed so the user must move quicker with every correct swipe.

Swipe successfully to discover minimalist expressions of five different Worlds and five different Thrones

Epic Discover Thrones soundtrack was composed in the heart of Bombay, India by DJ Nanok.
Follow him on Facebook and Soundcloud for sweet tunes:
